reviews.review: Unpopular opinion but I cannot stand this game - the graphics and clunky/simplified combat and controls are terrible.

Been playing on and off since 1.3. Overall, the game is exactly what you expect and want from CS. Obviously, it's not the exact same game, but it's close enough to it (including the maps you knew and loved). New players or old school ones, you'll enjoy it. You'll come across a hacker now and then, but for the most part, hacking isn't much of an issue. Often the "hackers" are just good players / old school players and the person yelling hacks can't figure out why they have 1 kill and 11 deaths so it must be hacks. lol Once you get used to the aiming, just learn the maps and realize that a lot of skill is based around your ability to analyze angles. If you don't have a headset, get one and listen to the noises around you.
